daggers.Name: Dagger
daggers.Location: Starting equipment for the Thief class. Sold by Undead Merchant (Female) in Undead Burg.
daggers.Notes: A small, easily concealed dagger made for quick stabs.

daggers.Name: Ghost Blade
daggers.Location: Dropped by Banshees in the New Londo Ruins.
daggers.Notes: A ghostly dagger used by the ghosts of New Londo.

daggers.Name: Bandit's Knife
daggers.Location: Starting equipment for the Bandit class. Also sold by Shiva of the East in Blighttown.
daggers.Notes: Standard small dagger. When dual-wielded, one can utilize the chain attacks.

daggers.Name: Parrying Dagger
daggers.Location: Found in Blighttown, on a ledge close to the wheel elevator. Requires a jump to reach.
daggers.Notes: Dagger with a greatly curved guard. Used by swordsmen in pairs.

daggers.Name: Priscilla's Dagger
daggers.Location: Obtained by cutting off Crossbreed Priscilla's tail. The tail has a chance to become the dagger upon cutting.
daggers.Notes: Priscilla, the Dragon Crossbreed, can recover HP if you leave her tail intact. Her soul can be used to create unique weapon.

daggers.Name: Dark Silver Tracer
daggers.Location: Dropped by Ciaran, one of Gwyn's Four Knights, in the Duke's Archives. You can also obtain it from Gough after defeating Manus.
daggers.Notes: One of the rare weapons of the Darkwraiths. This weapon has a unique attack that inflicts both Magic and Humanity.

Straight Swords.Name: Straight Sword Hilt
Straight Swords.Location: Starting equipment for the Sorcerer class.
Straight Swords.Notes: A broken sword hilt that serves as a placeholder for the actual weapon.

Straight Swords.Name: Broken Straight Sword
Straight Swords.Location: Starting equipment for the Pyromancer class.
Straight Swords.Notes: A broken and ineffective straight sword.

Straight Swords.Name: Broadsword
Straight Swords.Location: Found in the Undead Parish. Dropped by Balder Knights.
Straight Swords.Notes: Standard straight sword. Dull, reliable, and all business.

Straight Swords.Name: Shortsword
Straight Swords.Location: Starting equipment for the Warrior class. Sold by Domhnall of Zena in the Depths.
Straight Swords.Notes: A small and easily wielded straight sword.

Straight Swords.Name: Longsword
Straight Swords.Location: Starting equipment for the Knight and Bandit classes. Sold by Andre of Astora in the Undead Parish.

Straight Swords.Name: Barbed Straight Sword
Straight Swords.Location: Dropped by Maneater Shells in Blighttown.
Straight Swords.Notes: A curved sword with sharp spikes on its blade.

Straight Swords.Name: Sunlight Straight Sword
Straight Swords.Location: Obtained by offering 10 Sunlight Medals to the Altar of Sunlight. Requires joining the Warrior of Sunlight covenant.
Straight Swords.Notes: A straight sword imbued with the power of the sun. Scales with Faith.

Straight Swords.Name: Balder Side Sword
Straight Swords.Location: Dropped by Balder Knights in the Undead Parish or Sen's Fortress.
Straight Swords.Notes: A well-crafted sword named after Balder, the homeland of the Knight King Rendal.

Straight Swords.Name: Astora's Straight Sword
Straight Swords.Location: Found in the Valley of Drakes. Requires a Master Key to access it in a chest near the Undead Dragon.
Straight Swords.Notes: A rare and unique weapon, this sword is exclusive to Astora. It requires high Faith to wield effectively.

Straight Swords.Name: Silver Knight Straight Sword
Straight Swords.Location: Dropped by Silver Knights in Anor Londo.
Straight Swords.Notes: A straight sword blessed by the Dark Sun, Gwyndolin.

Straight Swords.Name: Drake Sword
Straight Swords.Location: Obtained by cutting off the Drake's tail in the Undead Parish with ranged attacks or after ringing the first Bell of Awakening.
Straight Swords.Notes: A dragon weapon from the tail of the drake at the Bridge.

Straight Swords.Name: Darksword
Straight Swords.Location: Dropped by Darkwraiths in New Londo Ruins.
Straight Swords.Notes: The Darkwraiths, incited by Kaathe, use the dark sword, a weapon that is far more sinister than standard weapons.

Straight Swords.Name: Crystal Straight Sword
Straight Swords.Location: Dropped by Crystal Hollows in the Duke's Archives. A non-renewable item.
Straight Swords.Notes: A straight sword with a crystalline blade.

Greatswords.Name: Bastard Sword
Greatswords.Location: Found in the Undead Parish and Sen's Fortress.
Greatswords.Notes: A standard greatsword. Very powerful for its weight.

Greatswords.Name: Black Knight Sword
Greatswords.Location: Dropped by Black Knights in various locations.
Greatswords.Notes: A greatsword born from the soul of the Black Dragon Kalameet. Known for its devastating power.

Greatswords.Name: Claymore
Greatswords.Location: Found in the Undead Burg, on a bridge guarded by a Hellkite Drake.
Greatswords.Notes: A very large greatsword. Effective against multiple foes.

Greatswords.Name: Flamberge
Greatswords.Location: Dropped by the Flamberge-wielding Infested Ghouls in Blighttown.
Greatswords.Notes: A greatsword with a flame design. This greatsword has a wavy, torch-like blade.

Greatswords.Name: Crystal Greatsword
Greatswords.Location: Dropped by Crystal Hollows in the Duke's Archives. A non-renewable item.
Greatswords.Notes: A greatsword with a crystalline blade.

Greatswords.Name: Man-Serpent Greatsword
Greatswords.Location: Dropped by Serpent Soldiers in Sen's Fortress.
Greatswords.Notes: A greatsword cut from the tail of a great serpent.

Greatswords.Name: Great Lord Greatsword
Greatswords.Location: Acquired by joining the Blade of the Darkmoon covenant and advancing to the rank of +1. Rewards from Gwyndolin.
Greatswords.Notes: A greatsword associated with Gwyn, the first Lord. It is the tail of Gwyn's firstborn son.

Greatswords.Name: Moonlight Greatsword
Greatswords.Location: Obtained by cutting off Seath the Scaleless's tail in the Duke's Archives.
Greatswords.Notes: A greatsword born from the mystical power of Seath The Scaleless.

Greatswords.Name: Greatsword of Artorias
Greatswords.Location: Cursed version: Created by ascending any standard +10 greatsword or straight sword (e.g., Longsword, Broadsword, Bastard Sword, etc.) using the Soul of Sif. Uncursed version: Cursed version + Soul of Sif.
Greatswords.Notes: Cursed version: The sword can be wielded by Artorias, the Abysswalker. This greatsword, bestowed only upon elite knights, is a relic of the ruined land of Oolacile. Cursed with the Darksign. Uncursed version: A greatsword born from the soul of Artorias, the Abysswalker. Its unique attack greatly reduces enemy poise.

Greatswords.Name: Stone Greatsword
Greatswords.Location: Found in a hidden path in Darkroot Garden, behind a fake wall.
Greatswords.Notes: A greatsword with a granite blade.

Greatswords.Name: Abyss Greatsword
Greatswords.Location: Ascend any standard +10 greatsword or straight sword using the Soul of Artorias.
Greatswords.Notes: A greatsword born from the soul of Artorias, the Abysswalker. Its unique attack greatly reduces enemy poise.

Greatswords.Name: Obsidian Greatsword
Greatswords.Location: Obtained by cutting off the tail of the Black Dragon Kalameet
Greatswords.Notes: A greatsword of unknown origin, highly resistant to fire, and blessed with the ability to perform a special, strong attack.

UltraGreatswords.Name: Dragon Greatsword
UltraGreatswords.Location: Located at Ash Lake. Near the everlasting dragon.
UltraGreatswords.Notes: This sword, one of the rare dragon weapons, is formed by a drake's tail.

UltraGreatswords.Name: Greatsword
UltraGreatswords.Location: Dropped by Black Knights in the Kiln of the First Flame.
UltraGreatswords.Notes: An ordinary greatsword used by humans.

UltraGreatswords.Name: Black Knight Greatsword
UltraGreatswords.Location: Dropped by Black Knights in various locations.
UltraGreatswords.Notes: A greatsword born from the soul of the Black Dragon Kalameet. Known for its devastating power.

UltraGreatswords.Name: Zweihander
UltraGreatswords.Location: Found in the Firelink Shrine graveyard.
UltraGreatswords.Notes: A type of large greatsword normally wielded with two hands. Known for its strength.

UltraGreatswords.Name: Demon Great Machete
UltraGreatswords.Location: Dropped by Capra Demons in the Demon Ruins.
UltraGreatswords.Notes: This giant machete has a slash attack, and is a worker's tool in the Undead Parish.

CurvedSwords.Name: Scimitar
CurvedSwords.Notes: A curved sword with a finely-sharpened blade.

CurvedSwords.Name: Shotel
CurvedSwords.Location: Dropped by Shiva of the East in Blighttown or can be purchased from him in the Darkroot Garden.
CurvedSwords.Notes: Curved sword with a sharply curved blade. Can bypass defenses to deal damage.

CurvedSwords.Name: Falchion
CurvedSwords.Notes: A standard curved sword. Lightweight with a large slashing area.

CurvedSwords.Name: Quelaag's Furysword
CurvedSwords.Location: Created by ascending a +10 curved sword with the soul of Quelaag. Crafted by the Giant Blacksmith.
CurvedSwords.Notes: Curved sword born from the soul of Quelaag, daughter of the Witch of Izalith.

CurvedSwords.Name: Painting Guardian Sword
CurvedSwords.Location: Dropped by Painting Guardians in Anor Londo.
CurvedSwords.Notes: Curved sword of the Painting Guardians, who protect the entrance to the painted world of Ariamis.

CurvedSwords.Name: Jagged Ghost Blade
CurvedSwords.Location: Dropped by Female Ghosts in New Londo Ruins.
CurvedSwords.Notes: Curved sword used by the ghostly Female Ghosts in New Londo.

CurvedSwords.Name: Gold Tracer
CurvedSwords.Location: Acquired by killing Ciaran, the Lord's Blade, in the Artorias of the Abyss DLC.
CurvedSwords.Notes: Curved sword used by Ciaran, a member of the Lord's Blades.

Katanas.Name: Uchigatana
Katanas.Notes: A katana of unknown origin with an unusually long blade.

Katanas.Name: Washing Pole
Katanas.Location: Sold by Shiva of the East in Blighttown or found in Blighttown after killing him.
Katanas.Notes: An extremely long katana known for its long reach.

Katanas.Name: Iaito
Katanas.Location: Located on the rafters above the main hall of Sen's Fortress.
Katanas.Notes: A katana with scabbard. A flowing single motion cuts both ways.

Katanas.Name: Chaos Blade
Katanas.Location: Created by ascending a +10 katana with the Soul of Quelaag. Crafted by the Giant Blacksmith.
Katanas.Notes: A cursed katana that inflicts damage upon its wielder.

Curved Greatswords.Name: Server
Curved Greatswords.Location: Dropped by the Infested Barbarians in Blighttown.
Curved Greatswords.Notes: A large, curved sword used by the Infested Barbarians.

Curved Greatswords.Name: Murakumo
Curved Greatswords.Location: Found in the Blighttown swamp, guarded by some Infested Barbarians.

Curved Greatswords.Name: Gravelord Sword
Curved Greatswords.Location: Dropped by Gravelord Nito in the Tomb of the Giants.
Curved Greatswords.Notes: Sword wielded only by servants of Gravelord Nito, the first of the dead.

Piercing Swords.Name: Rapier
Piercing Swords.Location: Found in Sen's Fortress, on a corpse.

Piercing Swords.Name: Estoc
Piercing Swords.Location: Found in the New Londo Ruins, on a corpse near the very large ember.
Piercing Swords.Notes: An unconventional weapon choice for a respectable warrior.

Piercing Swords.Name: Mail Breaker
Piercing Swords.Location: Found in the Undead Parish, in a chest near the Berenike Knight.

Piercing Swords.Name: Ricard's Rapier
Piercing Swords.Location: Dropped by Ricard in Sen's Fortress.
Piercing Swords.Notes: This weapon is shrouded in frost, and causes frostbite.

Piercing Swords.Name: Velka's Rapier
Piercing Swords.Location: Acquired from the crow's nest in Firelink Shrine by trading with Snuggly the Crow.
Piercing Swords.Notes: This weapon is shrouded in frost, and causes frostbite.

Axes.Name: Hand Axe
Axes.Location: Starting equipment for the Bandit class. Sold by Andre of Astora in the Undead Parish.

Axes.Name: Gargoyle Tail Axe
Axes.Location: Dropped by Bell Gargoyles in the Undead Parish.
Axes.Notes: Tail axe of the Bell Gargoyles.

Axes.Name: Battle Axe
Axes.Location: Starting equipment for the Warrior class. Sold by Andre of Astora in the Undead Parish.

Axes.Name: Butcher Knife
Axes.Location: Dropped by the Maneater Mildred in the Blighttown swamp.
Axes.Notes: Large cleaver that fully restores HP with each hit.

Axes.Name: Crescent Axe
Axes.Location: Dropped by Patches the Hyena in Tomb of the Giants or by Trusty Patches in Firelink Shrine after he kicks you into the pit.

Axes.Name: Golem Axe
Axes.Location: Obtained by cutting off the Stone Golem's arm in Anor Londo.
Axes.Notes: Stone golem's core, which never broke.

Great Axes.Name: Demon's Greataxe
Great Axes.Location: Dropped by Taurus Demons in the Demon Ruins.
Great Axes.Notes: Greataxe of the Taurus Demon, known for its leaping attacks.

Great Axes.Name: Greataxe
Great Axes.Location: Found in Blighttown, near the bonfire.
Great Axes.Notes: An axe of the Taurus Demon, makes the wielder move with immense sloth.

Great Axes.Name: Dragon King Greataxe
Great Axes.Location: Dropped by the Stone Dragon in Ash Lake.
Great Axes.Notes: Axe born from the tail of the Stone Dragon of Ash Lake, descendant of the ancient dragons.

Great Axes.Name: Black Knight Greataxe
Great Axes.Location: Dropped by Black Knights wielding it in various locations.
Great Axes.Notes: Greataxe of the Black Knights who wander Lordran.

Great Axes.Name: Stone Greataxe
Great Axes.Location: Acquired from the Stone Knight in Darkroot Garden or by the Stone Knight guarding the entrance to Darkroot Basin, near the Moonlight Butterfly.
Great Axes.Notes: Large axe with a huge crescent-shaped blade.

Hammers.Name: Club
Hammers.Location: Starting equipment for the Warrior and Bandit classes.

Hammers.Name: Reinforced Club
Hammers.Location: Dropped by Undead Attack Dogs in the Depths.
Hammers.Notes: A simple wooden club reinforced with a steel bar.

Hammers.Name: Mace
Hammers.Location: Starting equipment for the Cleric class. Sold by Andre of Astora in the Undead Parish.

Hammers.Name: Morning Star
Hammers.Location: Sold by Patches the Hyena in the Tomb of the Giants.

Hammers.Name: Warpick
Hammers.Location: Sold by Andre of Astora after he has been given the Large Ember.
Hammers.Notes: Hammer of Vamos, a skilled blacksmith in the Catacombs.

Hammers.Name: Pickaxe
Hammers.Location: Sold by Andre of Astora after he has been given the Large Ember.

Hammers.Name: Blacksmith Hammer
Hammers.Location: Dropped by the Blacksmith Giant in Anor Londo.

Hammers.Name: Blacksmith Giant Hammer
Hammers.Location: Dropped by the Blacksmith Giant in Anor Londo.

Hammers.Name: Hammer of Vamos
Hammers.Location: Can be obtained by cutting off Vamos the Blacksmith's tail in the Catacombs.
Hammers.Notes: Huge hammer of Vamos, a skilled blacksmith in the Catacombs.

Great Hammers.Name: Demon's Great Hammer
Great Hammers.Location: Dropped by Taurus Demons in the Demon Ruins.
Great Hammers.Notes: Great hammer of the Taurus Demon, known for its leaping attack.

Great Hammers.Name: Great Club
Great Hammers.Location: Found in Blighttown, near the bonfire.

Great Hammers.Name: Large Club
Great Hammers.Location: Dropped by the Large Club-wielding Barbarians in Blighttown.

Great Hammers.Name: Dragon Tooth
Great Hammers.Location: Dropped by Havel the Rock in Anor Londo.
Great Hammers.Notes: Great hammer made of stone, associated with Havel the Rock.

Great Hammers.Name: Smough's Hammer
Great Hammers.Location: Dropped by Executioner Smough in Anor Londo.
Great Hammers.Notes: Great hammer of Smough, the Executioner.

Great Hammers.Name: Grant
Great Hammers.Location: Dropped by Paladin Leeroy in the Tomb of the Giants.
Great Hammers.Notes: Large wooden hammer associated with Paladin Leeroy.

Fist and Claw.Name: Caestus
Fist and Claw.Location: Sold by Andre of Astora after he has been given the Large Ember.
Fist and Claw.Notes: Simple weapon that straps to one's fists.

Fist and Claw.Name: Claws
Fist and Claw.Location: Sold by Shiva of the East in Blighttown after he is killed.
Fist and Claw.Notes: Grim, grotesque weapon used by Shiva of the East.

Fist and Claw.Name: Dragon Bone Fist
Fist and Claw.Location: Dropped by the Undead Dragon in the Painted World of Ariamis.
Fist and Claw.Notes: Dragon bone fist that wields its own buffed power.

Fist and Claw.Name: Dark Hand
Fist and Claw.Location: Obtained from Darkwraiths in New Londo Ruins.
Fist and Claw.Notes: The Dark Hand is a weapon that is also a special shield.

Spears.Name: Spear
Spears.Location: Starting equipment for the Hunter class. Sold by Andre of Astora in the Undead Parish.

Spears.Name: Winged Spear
Spears.Location: Sold by Shiva of the East in Blighttown after he is killed.

Spears.Name: Demon's Spear
Spears.Location: Dropped by Bat Wing Demons in Anor Londo.
Spears.Notes: Spear born from the tail of the Moonlight Butterfly.

Spears.Name: Pike
Spears.Location: Found in Sen's Fortress, near the entrance to the roof.

Spears.Name: Dragonslayer Spear
Spears.Location: Soul of Ornstein + any spear or thrusting sword.
Spears.Notes: Spear of Ornstein, Dragonslayer Knight who guards the cathedral in the forsaken city of Anor Londo.

Spears.Name: Partizan
Spears.Location: Found in Sen's Fortress, in a chest near Siegmeyer of Catarina.

Spears.Name: Channeler's Trident
Spears.Location: Dropped by the Channelers in the Duke's Archives.
Spears.Notes: Trident of the Six-eyed Channelers, sorcerers who serve Seath the Scaleless.

Spears.Name: Silver Knight Spear
Spears.Location: Dropped by Silver Knights in Anor Londo.
Spears.Notes: Spear born from the soul of Ornstein.

Spears.Name: Moonlight Butterfly Horn
Spears.Location: Soul of the Moonlight Butterfly + any spear or thrusting sword.
Spears.Notes: Mystery weapon, born from the mystical Moonlight Butterfly.

Spears.Name: Four-pronged Plow
Spears.Location: Dropped by Giant Sentinels in Anor Londo.
Spears.Notes: Giant Four-Pronged Plow, born from the soul of the Giant Sentinel.

Halberds.Name: Halberd
Halberds.Location: Sold by Andre of Astora in the Undead Parish.

Halberds.Name: Gargoyle's Halberd
Halberds.Location: Dropped by Bell Gargoyles in the Undead Parish.
Halberds.Notes: Halberd of the Gargoyles, guardians of the Bell of Awakening.

Halberds.Name: Titanite Catch Pole
Halberds.Location: Dropped by Prowling Demons in the Painted World of Ariamis.
Halberds.Notes: A pole that can be thrust like a spear.

Halberds.Name: Black Knight Halberd
Halberds.Location: Dropped by Black Knights wielding it in various locations.
Halberds.Notes: Halberd of the Black Knights who wander Lordran.

Halberds.Name: Great Scythe
Halberds.Location: Found in the Catacombs on a corpse near the first fog gate.
Halberds.Notes: Great scythe known for its use in harvesting.

Halberds.Name: Lifehunt Scythe
Halberds.Location: Soul of Priscilla + any Scythe or Halberd.
Halberds.Notes: Scythe of Priscilla, the Halfbreed, who was born of the great white being that once served the gods.

Halberds.Name: Scythe
Halberds.Location: Starting equipment for the Thief class. Sold by Shiva of the East in Blighttown after he is killed.

Halberds.Name: Lucerne
Halberds.Location: Found in the Catacombs, in a room near the first fog gate.

Halberds.Name: Giant's Halberd
Halberds.Location: Dropped by Giant Sentinels in Anor Londo.
Halberds.Notes: Halberd of the Giant Sentinels, guards of Anor Londo.

Whips.Name: Whip
Whips.Location: Found in Blighttown, near the water wheel.

Whips.Name: Notched Whip
Whips.Location: Found in the Painted World of Ariamis, on a corpse near the Phalanx area.

Whips.Name: Guardian Tail
Whips.Location: Cut off the Sanctuary Guardian's tail in the Royal Wood.

Bows.Name: Short Bow
Bows.Location: Sold by Andre of Astora in the Undead Parish.

Bows.Name: Longbow
Bows.Location: Starting equipment for the Hunter class.

Bows.Name: Composite Bow
Bows.Location: Sold by Andre of Astora after he has been given the Large Ember.

Bows.Name: Black Bow of Pharis
Bows.Location: Dropped by Pharis in the Darkroot Garden.
Bows.Notes: Black long bow of Pharis, a master bowman.

Greatbows.Name: Dragonslayer Greatbow
Greatbows.Location: Dropped by Dragonslayer Ornstein in Anor Londo.
Greatbows.Notes: Greatbow of the Dragonslayers, led by Hawkeye Gough.

Greatbows.Name: Gough's Greatbow
Greatbows.Notes: Greatbow of Hawkeye Gough, one of Gwyn's Four Knights.

Crossbows.Name: Light Crossbow
Crossbows.Location: Found in the Lower Undead Burg, near the Undead Merchant.

Crossbows.Name: Heavy Crossbow
Crossbows.Location: Found in Sen's Fortress, near the first rolling boulder.
Crossbows.Notes: A crossbow that is optimized for punishing foes.

Crossbows.Name: Sniper Crossbow
Crossbows.Location: Dropped by Berenike Knights in Sen's Fortress.

Crossbows.Name: Avelyn
Crossbows.Location: Treasure in the Painted World of Ariamis.

Flames.Name: Pyromancy Flame
Flames.Location: Starting equipment for the Pyromancer class.

Flames.Name: Pyromancy Flame (Upgraded)
Flames.Location: Ascend a standard Pyromancy Flame +10 with Quelana of Izalith.

Catalysts.Name: Sorcerer's Catalyst
Catalysts.Location: Starting equipment for the Sorcerer class.

Catalysts.Name: Izalith Catalyst
Catalysts.Location: Dropped by Daughter of Chaos in Lost Izalith.
Catalysts.Notes: Catalyst of the Witch of Izalith, mother of pyromancy and daughter of chaos.

Catalysts.Name: Logan's Catalyst
Catalysts.Location: Dropped by Big Hat Logan in the Duke's Archives, or purchased from him after he goes hollow.
Catalysts.Notes: Catalyst of Big Hat Logan, an ancient sorcerer.

Catalysts.Name: Beatrice's Catalyst
Catalysts.Location: Obtained by summoning Witch Beatrice for the Moonlight Butterfly boss fight and defeating the boss.
Catalysts.Notes: Catalyst of Beatrice, sorceress of the great Lord Gwyn, mentor of Solaire of Astora.

Catalysts.Name: Oolacile Ivory Catalyst
Catalysts.Location: Sold by Dusk of Oolacile in Darkroot Basin.
Catalysts.Notes: Catalyst of the sorceries of Oolacile, a land of ancient golden sorceries.

Catalysts.Name: Demon's Catalyst
Catalysts.Location: Dropped by Taurus Demons in the Demon Ruins or purchased from Eingyi in Blighttown.
Catalysts.Notes: Catalyst of the Demon Firesage, from the land of the demons.

Catalysts.Name: Tin Banishment Catalyst
Catalysts.Location: Dropped by Patches the Hyena or purchased from him in the Tomb of the Giants.

Catalysts.Name: Tin Crystallization Catalyst
Catalysts.Location: Soul of Seath the Scaleless + any catalyst.
Catalysts.Notes: Catalyst crystallized by Seath the Scaleless.

Catalysts.Name: Tin Darkmoon Catalyst
Catalysts.Location: Covenant reward from the Blades of the Darkmoon.
Catalysts.Notes: Catalyst of the Darkmoon Knights, protectors of the gods.

Catalysts.Name: Oolacile Catalyst
Catalysts.Location: Dropped by the Humanity Phantoms in Oolacile Township.
Catalysts.Notes: Catalyst of the sorceries of Oolacile, a land of ancient sorceries.

Catalysts.Name: Manus Catalyst
Catalysts.Location: Dropped by Manus, Father of the Abyss in the Artorias of the Abyss DLC.
Catalysts.Notes: Catalyst of Manus, the primeval man.

Talismans.Name: Talisman
Talismans.Location: Starting equipment for the Cleric class.

Talismans.Name: Canvas Talisman
Talismans.Location: Sold by Petrus of Thorolund in Firelink Shrine.

Talismans.Name: Thorolund Talisman
Talismans.Location: Starting equipment for the Cleric class.

Talismans.Name: Ivory Talisman
Talismans.Location: Sold by Oswald of Carim in the Undead Parish.

Talismans.Name: Sunlight Talisman
Talismans.Location: Dropped by Solaire of Astora in Anor Londo.

Talismans.Name: Velka's Talisman
Talismans.Location: Sold by Oswald of Carim in the Undead Parish.

Talismans.Name: Darkmoon Talisman
Talismans.Location: Join the Blade of the Darkmoon covenant and achieve rank +1.
Talismans.Notes: Catalyst of the Darkmoon Knights, protectors of the gods.
